txt.en: Your critical hits strike with such precision as to catch your enemy off-guard, providing a chance to dismount them instantly.

#1:[placeholder]: While utilizing the Riddermark Discipline the following skills have a 25% chance to instantly dismount the target when they critically hit: #1:{None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath[C]|Swift Cut, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Cry of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Storm, Oration of the Bleak Sky, Resolution of Storms[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]| Biting Edge, Execute[B]| Momentous Hit[R]| Quick Strike, Precise Blade, Anchored Thrust[O]|Quick Strike, Precise Blade, Anchored Thrust[O]}
